nodes.text: Convoy's Courage was a starfighter squadron of the New Republic. The squadron's members were renowned for their flawless flight record in medical and escort operations. The Squadron's starships were purple and gray, with yellow stripes.

Convoy's Courage was one of the multiplayer starfighter cosmetic options in the 2020 game Star Wars: Squadrons. In an earlier pre-release version of the game, the cosmetic was named Caravan's Courage, a possible nod to Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure.
